page.title: 02Norton-on-Derwent(continued)
page.content:
While racehorse training is an important part of the area's activities there are a number of other expanding industries connected to the agricultural nature of the area. These include two bacon factories, a wool grading plant, agricultural engineering and a trout hatchery. A bright steel works occupies a major place in Norton-on-Derwent's industrial scene.
Within the area there are located a number of organisations covering practically interest from stamp collecting to pigeon fancying and a number of amateur operatic and drama societies as well as brass bands. The Norton Youth Brass provides a nursery for promising youngsters in the district.(continued)
